original: @1b #// rgya gar skad du /🔽a'arya su bi kr'anta bi kr'a ma pa ri pritstsha pra dzny'a p'a ra mi t'a ni de sha; bod skad du /🔽'phags pa rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas zhus pa /
analyzed: @1b #// rgya gar skad du / a'arya su bi kr'anta bi kr'a ma pa ri pritstsha pra dzny'a p'a ra mi t'a ni de sha; bod skad du / 'phags pa rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas zhus pa /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa /
translated: Ārya-Subhūti-vikrānta-vikrāmi-pariprcchā-prajñāpāramitā-nirdeśa🔽In Tibetan: 'phags pa rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas zhus pa🔽śes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa

original: bam po dang po /🔽sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽'di skad bdag @2a #//
analyzed: bam po dang po / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo // 'di skad bdag @2a #//
translated: bam po dang po🔽sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo

original: gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na

original: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka landa ka gnas pa na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nas 'dus pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka landa ka gnas pa na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nas 'dus pa /
translated: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nas 'dus pa

original: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa /
analyzed: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa /
translated: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa

original: tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
analyzed: tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
translated: dpag tu med grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te

original: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to //
analyzed: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to //
translated: At that time, the Bhagavān was teaching the Dharma, surrounded by a retinue of hundreds of thousands.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis @2b rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis @2b rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga
translated: Then the bodhisattva mahāsattva Suvikrāntavikrāmin, who was present in that assembly, rose from his seat, draped his upper robe over one shoulder, and knelt on his right knee.

original: sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: He bowed to the Bhagavān with palms joined and said to the Bhagavān,

original: gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na /
analyzed: gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na /
translated: “If I were to ask the Bhagavān a question and the Bhagavān were to give me an opportunity to respond,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so //
translated: I would like to ask the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, a few questions.”

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: The Blessed One said to the bodhisattva great being Suvikrāntavikrāmin, “Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khyod ci dang @3a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khyod ci dang @3a *//
translated: ask whatever you like of the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One.

original: ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o //
analyzed: ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o //
translated: I will delight your mind by answering your questions.”

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The bodhisattva great being Suvikrāntavikrāmin said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba /
translated: why is it called the perfection of wisdom?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ji tsam gyis na /
analyzed: ji tsam gyis na /
translated: to what extent

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi /
translated: what is meant by the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings?

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar na /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom?

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar na /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes @3b rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes @3b rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings who practice the perfection of wisdom complete the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom?

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar na /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa na bdud sdig can gyis glags mi rnyed cing bdud kyi las thams cad kyang rtogs par 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa na bdud sdig can gyis glags mi rnyed cing bdud kyi las thams cad kyang rtogs par 'gyur ba lags /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings who cultivate the perfection of wisdom not get caught by Māra the evil one, and how do they recognize all the works of Māra?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ji lta bus gnas na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ji lta bus gnas na /
translated: In what way do bodhisattva great beings stand in the perfection of wisdom?

original: myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags /
translated: In what way do they stand so that they will quickly complete the qualities of the knowledge of an omniscient one?”

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Blessed One replied to the bodhisattva great being Suvikrāntavikrāmin, saying,

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: “Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don dang / ci nas khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang /
analyzed: khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don dang / ci nas khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang /
translated: you are asking about the meaning of the bodhisattva great beings, and you are asking in such a way that you will benefit many people, make many people happy, and be compassionate toward the world.

original: phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing /
analyzed: phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing /
translated: You are asking for the sake of the benefit,🔽the welfare, and the happiness of many people,

original: da ltar gyi dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la snang ba byed par 'dod pas /
analyzed: da ltar gyi dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la snang ba byed par 'dod pas /
translated: and for the present and future bodhisattva great beings, wishing to illuminate them,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ba legs so //🔽legs so // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du byang chub sems @4a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ba legs so // legs so // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du byang chub sems @4a *//
translated: you have asked the Thus-Gone One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Buddha about the perfection of wisdom.🔽Excellent, excellent!”

original: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Then, the Blessed One, as if knowing what the bodhisattva great being Suvikrāntavikrāmin was thinking, said this to him:

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: “Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: khyod don gyi dbang gang mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di lta bu 'dri /
analyzed: khyod don gyi dbang gang mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di lta bu 'dri /
translated: what is the meaning that you have seen that you ask the Thus-Gone One about this matter?”

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The bodhisattva great being Suvikrāntavikrāmin said this to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di zhu lags so //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di zhu lags so //
translated: I ask this of the Tathāgata for the sake of healing all sentient beings, out of love for all sentient beings, and for the benefit of all sentient beings.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is because

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: this perfection of wisdom

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / chos thams cad sdud pa lags pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / chos thams cad sdud pa lags pa'i slad du'o //
translated: includes the qualities of the hearers, solitary buddhas, bodhisattvas, and perfect buddhas, and all phenomena.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,🔽those sentient beings who are destined for the vehicle of the hearers,

original: de la sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa la nges par gyur pa de dag gis thos na /
analyzed: de la sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa la nges par gyur pa de dag gis thos na /
translated: when they hear it,

original: myur du zag pa ma mchis pa'i sa mngon sum du bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la nges par gyur pa de dag kyang myur du rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /🔽gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par @4b zhugs pa de dag kyang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la ma zhugs shing sa gsum la ma nges pa de dag gis thos na /
analyzed: myur du zag pa ma mchis pa'i sa mngon sum du bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la nges par gyur pa de dag kyang myur du rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par @4b zhugs pa de dag kyang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la ma zhugs shing sa gsum la ma nges pa de dag gis thos na /
translated: those who are certain in the vehicle of the solitary buddhas will quickly attain the result of the solitary buddhas,🔽those who are set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening will quickly fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: and those who have not entered into the faultless, who are not certain in the three vehicles, will, having heard it, produce the thought of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽Blessed One,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zhus pa'i lan btab pas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zhus pa'i lan btab pas /
translated: The Thus-Gone One has answered my questions on the perfection of insight.

original: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bstan du gsol /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bstan du gsol /
translated: Please teach the domain of the Thus-Gone One and the wisdom of the Thus-Gone One so that all beings may generate roots of virtue.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: bdag ni; sems can dman pa la mos pa rnams kyi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba ma lags /🔽dbul ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyi ma lags /
analyzed: bdag ni; sems can dman pa la mos pa rnams kyi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba ma lags / dbul ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyi ma lags /
translated: I do not ask the Thus-Gone One on behalf of beings with inferior aspirations.🔽I do not ask on behalf of those with poor minds.

original: dbul po'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
analyzed: dbul po'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
translated: I do not ask on behalf of those who have entered the vehicle of the poor.

original: le lo can rnams kyi slad du ma lags /🔽le lo'i zil gyis non pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
analyzed: le lo can rnams kyi slad du ma lags / le lo'i zil gyis non pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
translated: I do not ask on behalf of the lazy.🔽I do not ask on behalf of those who are overcome by laziness.

original: lta ba'i 'dam du bying ba rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
analyzed: lta ba'i 'dam du bying ba rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
translated: I do not ask on behalf of those who are mired in the swamp of views.

original: bdud kyi zhags pas zin pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
analyzed: bdud kyi zhags pas zin pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
translated: I do not ask on behalf of those who are caught in the noose of Māra.

original: ngo tsha ma 'tshal cing khrel ma mchis pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /🔽yo byad bsnyungs pa dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
analyzed: ngo tsha ma 'tshal cing khrel ma mchis pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags / yo byad bsnyungs pa dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
translated: not for those who are shameless and have no sense of decency,🔽not for those who are not endowed with the practice of austerity,

original: bskyud nges pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
analyzed: bskyud nges pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
translated: not for those who are forgetful,

original: sems 'khrul pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
analyzed: sems 'khrul pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
translated: not for those whose minds are confused,

original: 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba rnams kyi slad du ma lags /🔽g-yo can rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba rnams kyi slad du ma lags / g-yo can rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
translated: not for those who are mired in the swamp of desire,🔽not for those who are deceitful,

original: sgyu can rnams kyi slad du ma lags /🔽bgyis pa @5a *//
analyzed: sgyu can rnams kyi slad du ma lags / bgyis pa @5a *//
translated: not for those who are deceptive,

original: mi gzo ba rnams kyi slad du ma lags /🔽sdig pa 'tshal ba rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
analyzed: mi gzo ba rnams kyi slad du ma lags / sdig pa 'tshal ba rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
translated: not for those who are ungrateful,🔽not for those who know what is unwholesome,

original: sdig pa spyod pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
analyzed: sdig pa spyod pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
translated: not for those who engage in unwholesome actions,

original: tshul khrims nyams pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags; tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
analyzed: tshul khrims nyams pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags; tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
translated: not for those whose discipline is impaired, not for those whose discipline is impure,

original: lta ba ma nyams pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
analyzed: lta ba ma nyams pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
translated: not for those whose view is impaired,

original: bdud kyi spyod yul la spyod pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
analyzed: bdud kyi spyod yul la spyod pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
translated: not for those who engage in the domain of Māra,

original: bdag la bstod pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
analyzed: bdag la bstod pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
translated: not for the sake of praising myself,

original: gzhan la smod pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /🔽rnyed pa dang bkur sti la gdu ba rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
analyzed: gzhan la smod pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags / rnyed pa dang bkur sti la gdu ba rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
translated: not for the sake of disparaging others,🔽not for the sake of being attached to gain and honor,

original: lhung bzed dang chos gos la chags pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
analyzed: lhung bzed dang chos gos la chags pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
translated: not for the sake of being attached to my alms bowl and robes,

original: tshul 'chos pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /🔽kha gsag can rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
analyzed: tshul 'chos pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags / kha gsag can rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
translated: not for the sake of hypocrisy,🔽not for the sake of flattery,

original: gzhogs slong can rnams kyi slad du ma lags /🔽thob kyis 'jal ba rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
analyzed: gzhogs slong can rnams kyi slad du ma lags / thob kyis 'jal ba rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
translated: not for the sake of hinting,🔽not for the sake of extortion,

original: rnyed pa la rnyed par sgrub pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
analyzed: rnyed pa la rnyed par sgrub pa rnams kyi slad du ma lags /
translated: not for the sake of acquiring gain through gain,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: sems can de lta bu rnams kyi slad du bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba ma lags so //
analyzed: sems can de lta bu rnams kyi slad du bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba ma lags so //
translated: it is not for the sake of such beings that I ask the Thus-Gone One.”

original: bcom ldan 'das; sems can gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshol ba dang / chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes dang / rang byung gi ye shes dang / mi mnyam pa'i ye shes dang / bla na med pa'i ye shes tshol ba de dag dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das; sems can gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshol ba dang / chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes dang / rang byung gi ye shes dang / mi mnyam pa'i ye shes dang / bla na med pa'i ye shes tshol ba de dag dang /
translated: unattached wisdom, self-arisen wisdom, unequaled wisdom, and unsurpassed wisdom,

original: gang dag bdag dang pha rol kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: gang dag bdag dang pha rol kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: who do not even conceive of self and other,

original: bdag la bstod pa dang / gzhan la smod pa lta ga la mchis te /
analyzed: bdag la bstod pa dang / gzhan la smod pa lta ga la mchis te /
translated: how could they praise themselves and disparage others?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rva bcad pa @5b lta bur nga rgyal ma mchis pa /
analyzed: rva bcad pa @5b lta bur nga rgyal ma mchis pa /
translated: without pride like a cut tree,

original: zug rngu phyung ba /
analyzed: zug rngu phyung ba /
translated: having extracted the thorn,

original: gdol pa lta bur sems dma' ba /
analyzed: gdol pa lta bur sems dma' ba /
translated: with a humble mind like a chandala,

original: sems dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems can rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi slad du bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu lags so //
analyzed: sems dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems can rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi slad du bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu lags so //
translated: with a mind equal to water, fire, wind, space, and beings, for the sake of the bodhisattva mahasattvas, I ask the Tathagata.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang dag chos kyang mi dmigs shing rlom sems su mi bgyid la mngon par zhen pa ma mchis na /
analyzed: gang dag chos kyang mi dmigs shing rlom sems su mi bgyid la mngon par zhen pa ma mchis na /
translated: They do not apprehend phenomena and do not make assumptions about them, and they do not cling to them.

original: chos ma lags pa lta ga la mchis te /
analyzed: chos ma lags pa lta ga la mchis te /
translated: How could they be non-phenomena?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi slad du bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba lags so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi slad du bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba lags so //
translated: It is for the sake of those bodhisattva great beings that I ask the Thus-Gone One.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: bsam pa dag pa /🔽g-yo ma mchis pa /
analyzed: bsam pa dag pa / g-yo ma mchis pa /
translated: they are pure in their intentions,🔽without deceit,

original: sgyu ma mchis pa /
analyzed: sgyu ma mchis pa /
translated: without pretense,🔽honest,

original: drang ba / sems mnyam pa /
analyzed: drang ba / sems mnyam pa /
translated: and have an impartial mind.

original: sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / snying brtse ba can /🔽yang dag par 'dzin du stsol ba /🔽yang dag par gzengs bstod pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / snying brtse ba can / yang dag par 'dzin du stsol ba / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa /
translated: They are compassionate and loving toward all beings,🔽they encourage others,🔽they inspire others,

original: yang dag par dga' bar bgyid pa /
analyzed: yang dag par dga' bar bgyid pa /
translated: they delight others,

original: khur chen po khyer ba /🔽theg pa chen po la mngon par zhugs pa /
analyzed: khur chen po khyer ba / theg pa chen po la mngon par zhugs pa /
translated: they carry a great burden,🔽they have set out in the Great Vehicle,

original: bgyi ba chen pos so sor nye bar gnas pa /
analyzed: bgyi ba chen pos so sor nye bar gnas pa /
translated: they are engaged in great deeds,🔽they are endowed with great compassion,

original: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa; sems can thams cad bde ba thob par bgyid pa /
analyzed: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa; sems can thams cad bde ba thob par bgyid pa /
translated: they bring happiness to all beings,🔽they are guides,

original: 'dren pa / rnam par 'dren pa /
analyzed: 'dren pa / rnam par 'dren pa /
translated: and they are leaders.

original: yongs su 'dren pa /
analyzed: yongs su 'dren pa /
translated: the perfect guide,

original: chos thams cad la mi brten par gnas pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad la mi brten par gnas pa /
translated: who abides without relying on any phenomena,

original: skye ba'i gnas thams cad mi tshol ba /
analyzed: skye ba'i gnas thams cad mi tshol ba /
translated: who does not seek any place of birth,

original: bdud kyi zhags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba /
analyzed: bdud kyi zhags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba /
translated: who is liberated from all the snares of Māra,

original: 'dun pa can /🔽brtson 'grus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: 'dun pa can / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa /
translated: who is intent,🔽who is diligent,

original: bag mchis pa /
analyzed: bag mchis pa /
translated: who is conscientious,

original: chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa /
translated: who has reached the perfection of all phenomena,

original: the tshom thams cad gcod pa la @6a *//
analyzed: the tshom thams cad gcod pa la @6a *//
translated: and who is skilled in cutting through all doubts.

original: mkhas pa'i sems can rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi slad du bcom ldan 'das /🔽bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu lags so; ;bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: mkhas pa'i sems can rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi slad du bcom ldan 'das / bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu lags so; ;bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One, I ask this of the Thus-Gone One for the sake of those beings and of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la yang rlom sems su mi bgyid cing mngon par mi zhen la chags par mi gnas shing /
analyzed: sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la yang rlom sems su mi bgyid cing mngon par mi zhen la chags par mi gnas shing /
translated: Blessed One, I ask this of the Thus-Gone One for the sake of those beings who do not entertain any concepts about the wisdom of the buddhas, who do not cling to it, who do not abide in attachment to it,

original: rlom sems thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i lam la gnas pa /
analyzed: rlom sems thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i lam la gnas pa /
translated: who abide on the path that transcends all concepts,

original: lam du zhugs pa /
analyzed: lam du zhugs pa /
translated: who have entered the path,

original: lam ston pa'i sems can rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi slad du bcom ldan 'das; bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu lags so //
analyzed: lam ston pa'i sems can rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi slad du bcom ldan 'das; bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu lags so //
translated: I ask this of the Blessed One for the sake of all sentient beings who are to be guided, and for the sake of those bodhisattva great beings.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: bdag ni / sems can thams cad la bde ba dang / ltag na ma mchis pa'i bde ba dang / bla na ma mchis pa'i bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bde ba dang / 'dus ma bgyis pa'i bde ba nye bar sgrub par 'tshal te /
analyzed: bdag ni / sems can thams cad la bde ba dang / ltag na ma mchis pa'i bde ba dang / bla na ma mchis pa'i bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bde ba dang / 'dus ma bgyis pa'i bde ba nye bar sgrub par 'tshal te /
translated: I wish to accomplish the happiness of all sentient beings, the unsurpassed happiness, the unsurpassed bliss, the bliss of nirvāṇa, the bliss of buddhahood, and the bliss of the unconditioned.

original: bdag sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba dang / grub pa dang / bde ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu lags so //
analyzed: bdag sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba dang / grub pa dang / bde ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu lags so //
translated: I ask this of the Thus-Gone One for the sake of all sentient beings, for their healing, happiness, accomplishment, and well-being.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: bdag ni / the tshom ma mchis par 'tshal zhing /
analyzed: bdag ni / the tshom ma mchis par 'tshal zhing /
translated: I wish to be free of doubt.

original: the tshom ma mchis nas kyang sems can rnams kyi the tshom rab tu spang ba'i slad du chos bshad par 'tshal te /
analyzed: the tshom ma mchis nas kyang sems can rnams kyi the tshom rab tu spang ba'i slad du chos bshad par 'tshal te /
translated: and having no doubts, I would like to explain the Dharma in order to completely eliminate the doubts of sentient beings.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: bdag sems can thams cad kyi the tshom bsal ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la zhu lags so //
analyzed: bdag sems can thams cad kyi the tshom bsal ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la zhu lags so //
translated: I would like to ask the Blessed One to clear away the doubts of all sentient beings.

original: @6b de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: @6b de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: sems can thams cad ni /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ni /
translated: all sentient beings

original: sdug bsngal dang mi mthun zhing bde ba 'tshal la /
analyzed: sdug bsngal dang mi mthun zhing bde ba 'tshal la /
translated: are averse to suffering and seek happiness.

original: sems can thams cad ni /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ni /
translated: All sentient beings

original: bde ba don du gnyer ba lags te /
analyzed: bde ba don du gnyer ba lags te /
translated: are intent on happiness.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab ma gtogs par gzhan sems can rnams kyi bde ba gang yang bdag gis ma mthong zhing /
analyzed: shes rab ma gtogs par gzhan sems can rnams kyi bde ba gang yang bdag gis ma mthong zhing /
translated: I do not see any happiness for sentient beings other than wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa /
translated: apart from the vehicle of the bodhisattvas,

original: theg pa chen po ma gtogs par gzhan sems can rnams kyi bde ba gang yang ma mchis te /
analyzed: theg pa chen po ma gtogs par gzhan sems can rnams kyi bde ba gang yang ma mchis te /
translated: the Great Vehicle, there is no other happiness for sentient beings.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: bdag gis don gyi dbang 'di mthong bas sems can rnams la bde ba nye bar bsgrub pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhu lags so //
analyzed: bdag gis don gyi dbang 'di mthong bas sems can rnams la bde ba nye bar bsgrub pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhu lags so //
translated: I have seen this meaning, and so I ask about the perfection of wisdom in order to bring about the happiness of sentient beings.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don 'di yang dag par mthong bas bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di zhu lags so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don 'di yang dag par mthong bas bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di zhu lags so //
translated: seeing this meaning of the bodhisattvas, I ask the Thus-Gone One about this meaning.

original: de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: When this was said, the Blessed One said to the bodhisattva great being Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: “Excellent, Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: legs so // legs so //
analyzed: legs so // legs so //
translated: excellent!

original: khyod skye bo phal po che la snying brtse ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba ni /
analyzed: khyod skye bo phal po che la snying brtse ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba ni /
translated: Because you have compassion for many people, you ask the Thus-Gone One about this perfection of wisdom.

original: khyod kyi yon tan gyi mtha' rtogs par sla ba ma yin no //
analyzed: khyod kyi yon tan gyi mtha' rtogs par sla ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not easy to fathom the extent of your qualities.

original: de'i phyir rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Therefore, Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: legs par nyon la yid la rab tu zungs shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do //
analyzed: legs par nyon la yid la rab tu zungs shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do //
translated: listen well and keep this in mind, and I will explain it to you.”

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: legs so // zhes gsol nas byang chub sems @7a *//
analyzed: legs so // zhes gsol nas byang chub sems @7a *//
translated: excellent!”

original: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: said the bodhisattva mahāsattva Suvikrāntavikrāmin, and he listened as the Blessed One had instructed.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: The Blessed One said, “Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: khyod 'di skad du /
analyzed: khyod 'di skad du /
translated: you have asked,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ‘Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
translated: what is the perfection of wisdom?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba /
translated: Why is it called the perfection of wisdom?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ji tsam gyis na /
analyzed: ji tsam gyis na /
translated: to what extent

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi zhes zer ba ni /
translated: is it called the perfection of wisdom of the bodhisattvas?’

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,🔽the perfection of wisdom

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is🔽

original: chos gang gis kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: chos gang gis kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: It cannot be expressed by any phenomenon.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of wisdom

original: tshig thams cad las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: tshig thams cad las 'das pa'o //
translated: is beyond all words.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /🔽'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽'di'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽'dis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni / 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // 'di'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // 'dis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom

original: zhes brjod par mi nus so //
analyzed: zhes brjod par mi nus so //
translated: is not something that can be said to be ‘the perfection of wisdom,’🔽or ‘the perfection of wisdom of this one,’🔽or ‘by this one’s perfection of wisdom.’

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: 'di ni / chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni / chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te /
translated: it is the perfection of all phenomena,

original: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: and for that reason it is called the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: shes rab nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pas ma rnyed ma dmigs na; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: shes rab nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pas ma rnyed ma dmigs na; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: since the Thus-Gone One has not found or observed wisdom itself, how could he observe the perfection of wisdom?

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: shes rab ces bya ba 'di ni /🔽chos thams cad kun du shes pa 'di ni /
analyzed: shes rab ces bya ba 'di ni / chos thams cad kun du shes pa 'di ni /
translated: This is called wisdom.🔽It is the complete knowledge of all phenomena.

original: chos thams @7b cad kun tu rig pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams @7b cad kun tu rig pa ste /
translated: It is the complete understanding of all phenomena.

original: de'i phyir shes rab ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called wisdom.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: chos thams cad kun tu rig pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos thams cad kun tu rig pa gang zhe na /
translated: what is the complete understanding of all phenomena?

original: chos 'di dag thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos 'di dag thams cad ni /
translated: All these phenomena

original: rnam pa gzhan na /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan na /
translated: are of one form.

original: chos thams cad rnam pa gzhan du brjod de /
analyzed: chos thams cad rnam pa gzhan du brjod de /
translated: All phenomena are described in different ways,

original: chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni /
translated: but all phenomena

original: brjod pa las rnam par grol ba ma yin no //
analyzed: brjod pa las rnam par grol ba ma yin no //
translated: are not liberated from being described.

original: gang chos thams cad kun tu shes pa dang / gang chos thams cad kun tu rig pa de yang tshig gis brjod par mi nus mod kyi; 'on kyang ji ltar sems can rnams kyis shes par 'gyur ba de ltar shes rab ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang chos thams cad kun tu shes pa dang / gang chos thams cad kun tu rig pa de yang tshig gis brjod par mi nus mod kyi; 'on kyang ji ltar sems can rnams kyis shes par 'gyur ba de ltar shes rab ces bya'o //
translated: Although the complete knowledge of all phenomena and the complete understanding of all phenomena cannot be expressed in words, still, in order that beings may understand, it is called wisdom.

original: 'di ni / btags pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ni / btags pa zhes bya ste /
translated: This is called a designation.

original: de'i phyir shes rab ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called wisdom.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni /
translated: all phenomena

original: gdags su med /
analyzed: gdags su med /
translated: are not to be designated.

original: gzung du med /
analyzed: gzung du med /
translated: It cannot be grasped.

original: bshad du med /
analyzed: bshad du med /
translated: It cannot be explained.

original: snang ba med /
analyzed: snang ba med /
translated: It is not an appearance.

original: de lta bur kun tu rig pa de ni /
analyzed: de lta bur kun tu rig pa de ni /
translated: To be aware of it in that way

original: kun tu rig pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: kun tu rig pa zhes bya'o //
translated: is called ‘awareness. ’

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: shes rab ces bya ba de ni; kun shes pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: shes rab ces bya ba de ni; kun shes pa'ang ma yin /

analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab ces bya'o //

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa de ni /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa de ni /

analyzed: mi shes pa'i spyod yul yang ma yin /

analyzed: ye shes kyi spyod yul yang ma yin /

original: mi shes pa'i yul yang ma yin /
analyzed: mi shes pa'i yul yang ma yin /
translated: It is not the object of ignorance,

analyzed: ye shes kyi yul yang ma yin te /
translated: nor is it the object of wisdom.

original: ye shes ni /
analyzed: ye shes ni /

original: yul med pa'o //
analyzed: yul med pa'o //

analyzed: gal te ye shes la yul yod du zin na /

analyzed: mi shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: it would be ignorance.

original: ye shes ni /
analyzed: ye shes ni /
translated: Wisdom

original: mi shes pa las ma yin /
analyzed: mi shes pa las ma yin /
translated: is not from ignorance,

original: mi shes pa'ang ye shes las ma yin /
analyzed: mi shes pa'ang ye shes las ma yin /
translated: and ignorance is not from wisdom.

original: ye shes ni /
analyzed: ye shes ni /
translated: Wisdom

original: mi shes pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi shes pa ma yin /

original: ye shes pa yang ye shes ma yin te /
analyzed: ye shes pa yang ye shes ma yin te /
translated: Wisdom is not wisdom.

original: @8a *// ye shes kyis ye shes zhes bya'o //
analyzed: @8a *// ye shes kyis ye shes zhes bya'o //

analyzed: ye shes kyis mi shes pa zhes mi bya'o //

original: mi shes pas ye shes zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mi shes pas ye shes zhes bya'o //

original: de la ye shes de ni /
analyzed: de la ye shes de ni /

original: 'di'o // ye shes de ni /
analyzed: 'di'o // ye shes de ni /
translated: That wisdom🔽is not this.

original: 'di'i 'o; ;ye shes de ni /
analyzed: 'di'i 'o; ;ye shes de ni /

original: 'dis so // ye shes de ni /
analyzed: 'dis so // ye shes de ni /

original: 'di'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di'i phyir ro //
translated: is not for this.

original: zhes ye shes cung zad kyang bstan par mi nus te /
analyzed: zhes ye shes cung zad kyang bstan par mi nus te /

original: de'i phyir ye shes de ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir ye shes de ni /

original: ye shes nyid kyis med do //
analyzed: ye shes nyid kyis med do //
translated: does not exist by means of wisdom itself.

original: ye shes kyang ye shes su mi gnas te /
analyzed: ye shes kyang ye shes su mi gnas te /

analyzed: mi shes pas kyang ye shes zhes mi bya'o //

original: gal te mi shes pas ye shes zhes bya na ni /
analyzed: gal te mi shes pas ye shes zhes bya na ni /

analyzed: de'i phyir byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang ye shes can du 'gyur ro //
translated: then all childish ordinary beings would have wisdom.

original: gang ye shes dang mi shes pa mi dmigs shing ye shes dang mi shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa de nyid ye shes zhes bya ste /
analyzed: gang ye shes dang mi shes pa mi dmigs shing ye shes dang mi shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa de nyid ye shes zhes bya ste /
translated: “That which does not observe wisdom and ignorance, and that which knows wisdom and ignorance just as they are, is called wisdom.

original: ye shes ni /
analyzed: ye shes ni /
translated: Wisdom🔽is not as it is described.

original: ji skad du brjod pa de bzhin du ma yin no; ;de bas na /🔽ye shes ni /
analyzed: ji skad du brjod pa de bzhin du ma yin no; ;de bas na / ye shes ni /

original: brjod par bya ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba ma yin zhing /

original: yul thams cad las rab tu 'das pa ste /
analyzed: yul thams cad las rab tu 'das pa ste /

original: ye shes ni /
analyzed: ye shes ni /
translated: Wisdom

analyzed: gang gi yul yang ma yin no // ye shes kyi yul yang gang yang ma yin no; ;rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: is not an object of any kind.🔽Subhūti,

original: ye shes bstan pa'i yul yang ma yin /
analyzed: ye shes bstan pa'i yul yang ma yin /
translated: the object of the teaching of wisdom is not a direction.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /

analyzed: gang 'di ltar rab tu shes pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa dang / kun tu shes pa de ni /

original: shes rab ces bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab ces bya'o //

original: @8b rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: @8b rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /

analyzed: gang 'di ltar mngon par rtogs pa mngon sum du byed pa de ni /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: 'jig rten nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: 'jig rten nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If the world itself is not observed,

analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab lta ga la yod de /

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: des 'jig rten mi dmigs pas ci yang sgrol bar mi byed de /

analyzed: de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab ces bya'o //

analyzed: 'da' bar bya ba ni /

analyzed: pa zhes bya ste /

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni /

analyzed: 'di la ni /

analyzed: rnam par mi rgyug la /

analyzed: kun tu mi rgyug ste /

original: de'i phyir nges par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir nges par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //

analyzed: mi dge ba gang yang med de /

analyzed: ji lta bur rtogs she na /

analyzed: mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'bras dang / nad dang / zug rngu dang / stong pa nyid dang / sdig pa dang / gnod pa @10a *//
translated: He realizes it as impermanent, suffering, a boil, a disease, a thorn, empty, a crime, a disaster,

translated: an end, a destruction, a nature that is subject to destruction, as moving, as having the mode of destruction, as selfless, as unborn, as unceasing, and as having no characteristics.

analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /

analyzed: zug rngu med pa zhes bya'o //

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: de bzhin du 'di lta bu'i chos rnams dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni /

original: 'o na kyang 'di ltar mi shes pa zad pa dang / zad pa shes pa zhes bstan to //
analyzed: 'o na kyang 'di ltar mi shes pa zad pa dang / zad pa shes pa zhes bstan to //
translated: Nevertheless, it is taught like this: ‘The exhaustion of ignorance and the knowledge of exhaustion.’

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: gang gis chos thams cad mi zad pa dang / zad pa shes pa la brtags pa khong du chud pa de zad pa shes pa dang bral te /
analyzed: gang gis chos thams cad mi zad pa dang / zad pa shes pa la brtags pa khong du chud pa de zad pa shes pa dang bral te /
translated: those who understand the knowledge of exhaustion and the non-exhaustion of all phenomena are free from the knowledge of exhaustion

original: @12b zad pa med pa'i mtha' rjes su thob bo //
analyzed: @12b zad pa med pa'i mtha' rjes su thob bo //
translated: and attain the limit of non-exhaustion.

original: mtha' med pa ni /
analyzed: mtha' med pa ni /
translated: The limitless

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' ste /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' ste /
translated: is the limit of nirvāṇa.

original: ji skad du brjod pa bzhin du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ji skad du brjod pa bzhin du ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not as it is expressed.

original: chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni /
translated: All phenomena

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' ste /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' ste /
translated: are the limit of nirvāṇa.

original: mtha' med pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' med pa'o //
translated: They are limitless.

original: mtha' thams cad chad pa ni /
analyzed: mtha' thams cad chad pa ni /
translated: The cutting off of all limits

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' zhes bya ste /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' zhes bya ste /
translated: is called the limit of nirvāṇa.

original: ji skad du brjod pa bzhin du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ji skad du brjod pa bzhin du ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not as it is expressed.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' ni /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' ni /
translated: The limit of nirvāṇa

original: tha snyad thams cad chad pa /
analyzed: tha snyad thams cad chad pa /
translated: is the cutting off of all conventions.

original: brjod par bya ba ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba ma yin pa ste /
translated: It is not something that can be described.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings bstan pa 'di yang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du ni ma yin no //🔽bstan pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings bstan pa 'di yang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du ni ma yin no // bstan pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni /
translated: this teaching on the realm of nirvāṇa is not as it is taught.🔽The realm of nirvāṇa is not something that can be taught,

original: bstan du med de /
analyzed: bstan du med de /
translated: because it transcends all teachings.

original: bstan pa thams cad rab tu chad pa de ni /
analyzed: bstan pa thams cad rab tu chad pa de ni /
translated: The complete cessation of all teachings

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings zhes bya'o //
translated: is called the realm of nirvāṇa.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is called the realm of nirvāṇa

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab nges par rtogs pa bstan pa la bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab nges par rtogs pa bstan pa la bya'o //
translated: is taught to be the realization of supramundane wisdom.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings de ni /🔽yul na mi gnas /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings de ni / yul na mi gnas /
translated: that realm of nirvāṇa🔽is taught to be neither located in a place

original: phyogs na mi gnas pa zhes bstan to //
analyzed: phyogs na mi gnas pa zhes bstan to //
translated: nor located in a direction.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa //
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa //
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na /
translated: what is the perfection of wisdom in that regard?

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshu rol lam /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshu rol lam /
translated: Subhūti,

original: pha rol gang yang med do //
analyzed: pha rol gang yang med do //
translated: in the perfection of wisdom there is no near shore or🔽far shore.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /🔽gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshu rol lam /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa / gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshu rol lam /
translated: Subhūti,

original: pha rol dmigs na ni /
analyzed: pha rol dmigs na ni /
translated: if the near shore or far shore of the perfection of wisdom were apprehended,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas @13a *//🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshu rol lam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas @13a *// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshu rol lam /
translated: then the Tathāgata

original: pha rol bshad pa zhig na /
analyzed: pha rol bshad pa zhig na /
translated: would have explained the near shore or far shore of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Subhūti,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshu rol mi dmigs pas de'i phyir de'i pha rol kyang med mod kyi /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshu rol mi dmigs pas de'i phyir de'i pha rol kyang med mod kyi /
translated: since the near shore of the perfection of wisdom is not apprehended, therefore its far shore does not exist.

original: 'on kyang rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni /
analyzed: 'on kyang rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni /
translated: Nevertheless, Subhūti,

original: chos thams cad kyi pha rol lo //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi pha rol lo //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is the far shore of all phenomena.

original: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Therefore it is called the perfection of wisdom.

original: ji skad du brjod pa bzhin du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ji skad du brjod pa bzhin du ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not as it is said.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: the perfection of wisdom

original: tshig dang / las kyis nye bar gnas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tshig dang / las kyis nye bar gnas pa ma yin te /
translated: is not present through words and deeds.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of wisdom

original: bstan du med pa'o //
analyzed: bstan du med pa'o //
translated: is not something that can be shown.

original: chos thams cad de ltar khong du chud na /
analyzed: chos thams cad de ltar khong du chud na /
translated: When all phenomena are understood in this way,

original: de ni / ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu chud de /
analyzed: de ni / ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu chud de /
translated: they are fully understood as they are.

original: mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: mi 'gal lo //
translated: They are not contradictory.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de la khong du chud pa ci yang med cing rab tu rtogs pa yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la khong du chud pa ci yang med cing rab tu rtogs pa yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is nothing to be understood or fully understood there.

original: khong du chud pa dang / rab tu rtogs pa mnyam pa nyid ni /
analyzed: khong du chud pa dang / rab tu rtogs pa mnyam pa nyid ni /
translated: The sameness of understanding and full understanding

original: byang chub ste /
analyzed: byang chub ste /
translated: is awakening.

original: chos thams cad khong du chud pa ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad khong du chud pa ni /
translated: The understanding of all phenomena

original: byang chub ces bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub ces bya'o //
translated: is called awakening.

original: ji ltar chos thams cad khong du chud ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar chos thams cad khong du chud ce na /
translated: How are all phenomena understood?

original: 'di la byang chub gang yang med de /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub gang yang med de /
translated: There is no awakening here at all.

original: 'di khong du chud pa gang yang med de /
analyzed: 'di khong du chud pa gang yang med de /
translated: There is nothing to be understood here.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Subhūti,

original: gal te byang chub dmigs na ni /
analyzed: gal te byang chub dmigs na ni /
translated: if awakening were an object,

original: byang chub la yang byang chub dmigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub la yang byang chub dmigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then awakening would be an object of observation for awakening.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /🔽byang chub la ni /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa / byang chub la ni /
translated: Subhūti,🔽awakening

original: byang chub med de /
analyzed: byang chub med de /
translated: is not awakening.

original: de ltar @13b byang chub 'di mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar @13b byang chub 'di mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o //

original: khong du chud pa med pa dang / rab tu rtogs pa med pas rjes su rtogs pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: khong du chud pa med pa dang / rab tu rtogs pa med pas rjes su rtogs pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Because there is no comprehension and no realization, it is called ‘realization.’

original: ji skad du brjod pa bzhin du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ji skad du brjod pa bzhin du ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not as it is expressed.

analyzed: chos thams cad ni; khong du chud pa ma yin /

original: rab tu rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rab tu rtogs pa ma yin te /

analyzed: chos ni / chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis med do //
translated: Because phenomena do not exist due to the intrinsic nature of phenomena.

original: de ltar khong du chud pa de ni /
analyzed: de ltar khong du chud pa de ni /
translated: That comprehension

original: byang chub ces bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub ces bya'o //
translated: is called ‘awakening.’

analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa / de bzhin gshegs pas ni /
translated: Subhūti,

analyzed: byang chub ma dmigs shing /

original: de bzhin gshegs pas ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas ni /

original: byang chub rnam par ma rig ste /
analyzed: byang chub rnam par ma rig ste /

original: byang chub ni /
analyzed: byang chub ni /

analyzed: rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin /

original: rab tu rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rab tu rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin no //

analyzed: byang chub ni /

original: byang chub ni /
analyzed: byang chub ni /

analyzed: su'i yang ma yin zhing / byang chub la sems can nam /

analyzed: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes ji ltar brjod /

analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /

analyzed: byang chub la byang chub kyang med /

analyzed: byang chub la sems can yang med de /

original: byang chub 'di ni /
analyzed: byang chub 'di ni /

original: shin tu 'das pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu 'das pa'o //
translated: is utterly transcendent.

original: byang chub 'di ni /
analyzed: byang chub 'di ni /
translated: This awakening

original: ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'o //
translated: is unproduced.

original: byang chub 'di ni /
analyzed: byang chub 'di ni /
translated: This enlightenment

original: mngon par ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa'o //
translated: is not established.

original: byang chub 'di ni /
analyzed: byang chub 'di ni /
translated: This enlightenment

original: mtshan nyid med pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa ste /
translated: is without characteristics.

original: 'di la sems can med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'di la sems can med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: There are no sentient beings here, and they are not apprehended.

original: @14a *// byang chub ni /
analyzed: @14a *// byang chub ni /

original: sems can gyis btags pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sems can gyis btags pa ma yin gyi /

original: sems can med par khong du chud pa ni /
analyzed: sems can med par khong du chud pa ni /

analyzed: byang chub ces bya'o //

analyzed: byang chub sems can ma yin par gang gis shes pa de byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
